'''GetDiz''' is a popular, free text reading program, written by Outer Technologies.
'''GetDiz''' is a popular, free text reading program, written by Outer Technologies.
Line 17: Line 17:
It is an [[.nfo|NFO]] viewer that displays characters and designs common to [[The Scene]] in an easy to view format. It converts the text in the NFO file, which is essentially a text file, into a viewable design. The text viewer increases the viewability of the NFO by creating a larger contrast between each ASCII character. GetDiz is a freeware text-viewer alternative to [[DAMN NFO Viewer]]. It can display and edit txt, diz, ini and nfo file types. It includes print support with the latest version and urls, find/replace, and trim copy.
It is an [[.nfo|NFO]] viewer that displays characters and designs common to [[The Scene]] in an easy to view format. It converts the text in the NFO file, which is essentially a text file, into a viewable design. The text viewer increases the viewability of the NFO by creating a larger contrast between each ASCII character. GetDiz is a freeware text-viewer alternative to [[DAMN NFO Viewer]]. It can display and edit txt, diz, ini and nfo file types. It includes print support with the latest version and urls, find/replace, and trim copy.
â
As of 24 February 2004 the latest version is 3.0.0.0. After nearly years of inactivity, the program was updated and the newer 4.0.0.0 version was released 1 February 2008.[http://outertech.com/index.php?_charisma_page=news&id=36]
+
After nearly years of inactivity, the program was updated and the newer 4.0.0.0 version was released 1 February 2008.[http://outertech.com/index.php?_charisma_page=news&id=36]
